title: Xuny rounded geometric sans
content:
Please can anybody help me with this font, or if anybody knows any similar "curved" fonts then this will be a massive help, thanks alot guys.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Font1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052831/http:/typophile.com/files/Font1_0.jpg) | 48.28 KB |
author: golpys

comments.content:
Pretty sure this is custom.

You’d like:  
 [**Chennai**](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052831/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dooleytype/chennai/)  
 [**Chickens**](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052831/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sparkytype/chickens/)  
 [**Bryant** Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052831/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryant2/index.html), [Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052831/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryantcon/index.html) and [Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052831/http:/www.processtypefoundry.com/typefaces/bryantcom/index.html)  
 [**Chevin**](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052831/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=GTT0000003)

as i am still a tax dodging student, where is the best place to download these fonts for free?

cheers mate,

Those are commercial fonts which (hopefully) have not been posted for free. If you'd like to find some suitable free fonts you can look to any number of sites, although the quality will vary widely.

[http://typophile.com/wiki/FAQ\_Free](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052831/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FAQ_Free "http://typophile.com/wiki/FAQ\_Free")

You might like [Alba](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052831/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=alba&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=xuny&nb_ppp=10&psize=m&classt=alpha) from Font-a-licious, which is free.

- Lex
The [Ubuntu title font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150126052831/http:/betatype.com/node/19) is somewhat along these lines, uh, I mean curves.
